title: Aircraft maintenance certifying engineer
overviewOfRole: Maintaining and certifying a range of civil and military aircraft - from small aeroplanes and passenger airliners to jet fighters and helicopters.
optionsUnstructuredTemplate: Maintenance and rectification of aircraft avionic and mechanical systems
Maintenance and rectification of power-plant (piston & turbine engines), propellers & rotors
Fixed wing systems maintenance and practices
Application of business improvement techniques (personal accountability requirements) for working in an airworthiness environment (Maintenance practices)
Assembly, repair and replacement of pipe work for aircraft and engine systems
Inspect, repair, remove and replace aircraft electrical system wiring and components
Select and use appropriate electrical and avionic test equipment
Supervision of aircraft flight-line handling operations and/or second line maintenance activities
